column4: Salon Advantage Define Enhancing Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Salon Advantage Define Enhancing Shampoo - Imported (237 ml) Price: Rs.2300

Salon Advantage Define Enhancing Shampoo 8 Ounce.Define enhancing shampoo by salon advantage is a deep cleansing shampoo formulated with curl enhancing polymers and botanical extracts that leave hair shiny and clean for enhanced curls. The shampoo contains pro-vitamin B5 that promotes shine and strengthens strands. Keratin helps to repair damaged hair and vitamin E acts as a free radical service. Directions: apply small amount of product to wet hair and scalp massage gently until smooth lather is formed then rinse repeat if necessary.
